overview:
Rohn Jay Miller is Group Account Director with SapientNitro in Minneapolis, where he works with Target and other clients. He lives in Minneapolis, and leads strategic planning and research and manages work in marketing and multi-channel retail. He is the author of the blog Take5interactive, and is a frequent contributor to Social Media Today.

From 2000-2003 he was Senior Vice President - Product + Technology at Knight Ridder in San Jose, where he led the development of the e-publishing platform that supported Knight Ridder’s 32 daily newspapers and 41 city and specialty Websites.

Miller earned his MFA in 1992 from the USC School of Cinematic Arts in Los Angeles in film and television directing, and his BA in 1989 from the University of Minnesota in broadcast journalism.
